Title: ST_IsRing
Description: Returns true if a given LINESTRING is a ring, that is, both ST_IsClosed and ST_IsSimple. A simple curve does not pass through the same point more than once.  However, see MDEV-7510.
Examples: SELECT ST_IsRing(geometry) FROM (SELECT ST_GeomFromText('LINESTRING(0 0, 1 1, 0 0)') AS geometry) AS temp;
